description: This file defines a React component for a user registration page in a Next.js application, handling user input, form submission, and redirect logic based on authentication state.

methods.name: RegisterPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders the registration form and manages its logic.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission to register a new user, invoking registration logic and setting error messages if registration fails.

calls: setError("Registration failed. Email may be taken.")
